basics.name: Claudio Sole
basics.label: Founding Data Scientist, PhD
basics.summary: Data scientist working at the intersection of Operations Research and Machine Learning. PhD in discrete choice modeling and assortment optimization from Polytechnique Montréal.

education.area: Discrete Choice Modeling and Assortment Optimization

publications.name: On the Estimation of Discrete Choice Models to Capture Irrational Customer Behaviors
publications.summary: Proposes an estimation method for the Generalized Stochastic Preference choice model to capture irrational behaviors such as halo effects using partially-ranked preferences.

publications.name: A Partially Ranked Choice Model for Large-Scale Data-Driven Assortment Optimization
publications.summary: Proposes an embedded column-generation procedure to estimate partially ranked choice models from historical transaction and assortment data.

publications.name: An Exact Method for (Constrained) Assortment Optimization Problems with Product Costs
publications.summary: Proposes the first exact solution method for assortment optimization with product-specific costs under the multinomial logit choice model.
